description: Jane Smith is a retired librarian and older adult patient who actively participates in the "Literary Enthusiasts Book Club" and chats with friends on Slack.
relationship: Mark Johnson is Jane’s social-media acquaintance and fellow book-club member. Jane also interacts with Doctor Pan (her cardiologist at HeartCare Associates), family members such as Joe Doe, and friends including Tom Smith, Bob Smith, and Alice Wong through Slack.
